q: with the fantastic group of juniors he has for 2011. His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan. "He's my first Division I recruit," the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and the Albert said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley "has Michael Vick capabilities."

He had been expected to stay in Downing street for a few weeks while a successor as Mr David Cameron 's director of communications was found. "His choice" But a Downing Street source said: He had finished what he wanted to finish and good progress is being made with his replacement. "It was his choice to leave quietly but he said a proper goodbye to the prime minister and those he worked closely with. Mr Andy Coulson resigned as editor of the News of the World in 2007 when its royal editor, Clive Goodman , was jailed for conspiracy to access phone messages. With rumors swirling around Westminster earlier this week that Mr. Andy Coulson had already offered to resign, the prime minister publicly expressed full confidence in his aide. Obviously, when he was editor of the News of the World bad things happened at the newspaper, and when he found out about those things he resigned, and that was the right thing to do, Mr. David Cameron told BBC radio's Today program. unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, "the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years." It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat, Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google Inc. 's CEO by co-founder Larry Page. Both men, along with Google Inc. 's other co-founder Sergey Brin , have limited their salaries to$ 1 for years.
